<S%H3068>"For,<s%> behold, Yahweh <S%H6680>commands,<s%> and the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> will be <S%H5221>smashed<s%> to <S%H7447>pieces,<s%> and the <S%H6996>little<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> into <S%H1233>bits.<s%>

<S%H6965>For,<s%> behold, I will raise up against you a <S%H1471>nation,<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%>" <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies;<s%> "and they will <S%H3905>afflict<s%> you from the <S%H935>entrance<s%> of <S%H2574>Hamath<s%> to the <S%H5158>brook<s%> of the <S%H6160>Arabah.<s%>"
